g.text: Ultimate Detailed Customer Support Chatbot Interaction
Attempt to extract text from PDF
Log "All embeddings stored in FAISS index" (INFO)
Prompt user to upload a different file
Update chat history with user question
Log "Chat history updated with user question" (INFO)
Encode user question to generate embedding
Search for similar texts based on question embedding
Include system message: "You are a helpful customer support assistant."
Append user message and retrieved texts to messages
Format response for display (e.g., remove extra spaces, check for length)
Update chat history with assistant response
Log "Chat history updated with assistant response" (INFO)
